item.title: 看西班牙时尚巨头 Zara 的所有者 Inditex 表示，在 2 月 1 日至 3 月 11 日的上半年春季销售季中，按固定汇率计算，其销售额增长了 11%，超过了主要竞争对手 H&M 的年销售额增长率。
item.description:
WATCH: Zara-owner Inditex said that its sales jumped 11% in constant currency for the first half of the spring season between Feb. 1 and March 11, after the Spanish fashion giant surpassed main rival H&M's annual sales growth https://t.co/CbYN5RHMP1 pic.twitter.com/pSDXmxChju

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 观看：德国体育用品巨头阿迪达斯在 2023 年出现了 30 多年来的首次亏损，首席执行官比约恩-古尔登（Bjorn Gulden）在与说唱歌手坎耶-韦斯特（Kanye West）闹得不可开交后，正努力扭转品牌颓势。
item.description:
WATCH: German sportswear giant Adidas posted its first loss in more than 30 years in 2023 as CEO Bjorn Gulden works to turn the brand around after a messy break-up with rapper Kanye West https://t.co/dgxN52a8UP pic.twitter.com/AQb46NCPJe

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 众议院将对一项法案进行投票表决，该法案将给予字节跳动 165 天的时间剥离 TikTok，否则苹果、谷歌和其他公司运营的应用程序商店将无法合法提供 TikTok 或为字节跳动控制的应用程序提供网络托管服务。
item.description:
The House of Representatives is set to vote on a bill that would give ByteDance 165 days to divest TikTok or else app stores operated by Apple, Google and others could not legally offer TikTok or provide web hosting services to apps controlled by ByteDance https://t.co/pGm1LpYwZn pic.twitter.com/ALJnmQx9np

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 苹果公司在保护其 App Store 在欧洲 iPhone 和其他设备上的主导地位的斗争中做出了重大让步，称开发者将可以自由地直接向消费者发布他们的应用程序。点击此处了解更多信息：
item.description:
Apple made a major concession in its battle to protect the dominance of its App Store on iPhones and other devices in Europe saying developers will be free to distribute their apps directly to consumers. Read more here: https://t.co/CAL563wljA pic.twitter.com/k5msZluBSh

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 观看：国泰航空公司公布了四年来的首次年度盈利报告，该公司摒弃了导致严重亏损和裁员的与大流行病有关的限制措施，股价升至四年来的最高点。
item.description:
WATCH: Cathay Pacific reported its first annual profit in four years as the airline left behind the pandemic-linked restrictions that drove heavy losses and layoffs, pushing its shares to a four-year high https://t.co/kg4CeJ7FqB pic.twitter.com/AQA6iDiEXo

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 观看：丰田汽车同意为工厂工人加薪，加薪幅度为25年来之最，这增强了人们的预期，即丰厚的加薪将为央行下周做出关键政策调整提供余地。
item.description:
WATCH: Toyota Motor agreed to give factory workers their biggest pay increase in 25 years, heightening expectations that bumper pay raises will give the central bank leeway to make a key policy shift next week https://t.co/xGGPMWrPFV pic.twitter.com/WZzxVCzKmq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 科罗拉多大学博尔德分校信息科学教授凯西-菲斯勒（Casey Fiesler）认为，美国国会议员对短视频应用程序 TikTok 的担忧应适用于 "所有社交媒体平台"。
item.description:
Concerns from US Congress members over the short video app TikTok should apply to ‘all social media platforms,’ according to information science professor Casey Fiesler, of the University of Colorado Boulder https://t.co/j1mJj60Sut pic.twitter.com/RYxKKV1ODQ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国众议院计划就一项法案进行投票，该法案将给予 TikTok 的中国所有者字节跳动约六个月的时间来剥离这款被约 1.7 亿美国人使用的短视频应用，否则将面临禁令。
item.description:
The US House of Representatives plans to vote on a bill that would give TikTok's Chinese owner ByteDance about six months to divest the short-video app used by about 170 million Americans or face a ban https://t.co/pGm1LpZ4OV pic.twitter.com/hPq196yixX

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 苹果公司表示，为了遵守欧盟的《数字市场法案》，它将允许软件开发商通过自己的网站或在线市场直接销售他们的应用程序。点击此处了解更多信息：
item.description:
In compliance with the European Union's Digital Markets Act, Apple says it will allow software developers to sell their apps directly through their own websites or online marketplaces. Read more here: https://t.co/CAL563wljA pic.twitter.com/D2DZvAlo4a

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024
